data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon affecting the coast of Guangdong will moderate gradually in the next couple of days. The weather will be persistently fine and dry over the region. It will still be cool in the morning and daytime temperatures will rise slightly. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large over inland areas. A band of clouds will cover southern China midweek this week. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to reach the coast of southern China in the latter part of this week. The weather will become cool again over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251228","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine.
